description:
Makinohara Shouko is http://anidb.net/ch94422 [Sakuta]`s first crush. He met her at the Shichirigahama beach back when he was in middle school. She claims to be an alum of Minegahara High School but there is no record that she ever was a student. Little of her origins other than her name are known, clouding her in a veil of mystery.
Source: Official site
name: Makinohara Shouko
